content: 4 storm 4 biscuit 4 rose 4 lupin 1 mint 1 mint 1 violet 1 pistachio 1 olive 1 cherry 2 coral 2 plum 2 rose 2 lupin 2 rose 2 mint 3 biscuit 3 lupin 3 raspberry 3 rose 3 old gold 3 heather 4 plum 4 rose 4 old gold 4 violet 4 mint 4 olive 1 sage 1 lupin 1 coral 1 heather 1 old gold 1 violet 2 silver 2 cherry 2 old gold 2 pistachio 2 graphite 2 lupin 3 rose 3 silver 3 teal 3 plum 3 sage 3 silver 4 pistachio 4 graphite 4 mint 4 silver 4 cherry 4 rose 1 pistachio 1 plum 1 violet 1 silver 1 biscuit 1 cherry 2 heather 2 violet 2 pistachio 2 old gold 2 plum 2 old gold 3 plum 3 old gold 3 storm 3 coral 3 heather 3 teal 4 lupin 4 olive 4 rose 4 violet 4 lupin 4 silver 1 old gold 1 mint 1 olive 1 silver 1 olive 1 violet 2 olive 2 teal 2 storm 2 violet 2 silver 2 mint 3 coral 3 silver 3 cherry 3 heather 3 mint 3 pistachio 4 sage 4 violet 4 biscuit 4 storm 4 old gold 4 plum starting from the top left corner of the grid on previous page select the four colours for the circle motif note the colours in the photos do not correspond to the first square on the grid round 1 using colour no1 chain 4 slip_stitch to form a ring chain 2 counts as 1 treble_crochet 11 treble_crochet into circle slip_stitch to complete round finish off round 2 with colour no 2 attach yarn to any space chain 4 counts as 1 treble_crochet and chain 2 *1 treble_crochet in next st chain 2 repeat from * until there are 12 spokes sl st into the 2nd chain of first chain 4 to finish round round 3 with colour no 3 attach yarn to any space chain 3 counts as 1 dtr do a 3 dtr cluster st chain 3 do a 3dtr cluster st in next space and continue round slip_stitch to complete and finish off round 4 for the first square only and with colour no 4 attach yarn to any chain space ch3 counts as 1 dtr 2 dtr chain 3 3 dtr in same space *chain 1 3tr chain 1 3 treble_crochet chain 1 3 dtr chain 3 3 dtr repeat from * 3 times chain 1 3 treble_crochet ch1 3 treble_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch to complete round and finish off you will now have your first square completed take my advice and weave in all the ends as you go along or at least after each square continue by working the second square to the right in the top row as far as round 3 join as you go 1 work round 4 of the second square but only on two sides when you get to the corner on
